1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Granting You a Dreamlike Life (TV Series 2018â€“ )

1.plot: In the summer of 2016, Lin Jingyun, a French-Chinese epicure arrived in Dongjiang and wanted to know more about her grandmother Duan Tianying's love story. He met a chef called Cheng Musheng who looked exactly the same with her grandmother's lover. She made a bet with him and promised to tell him a love story if she lose. She finally lost because of Musheng's little tricks. She decided to tell him her grandma's legendary love story back to to 1920s.

locations: Haisi Movie Town, Hui'an, Quanzhou, Fujian, China
imdb.plot outline: In the summer of 2016, Lin Jingyun, a French-Chinese epicure arrived in Dongjiang. She was here to know more about her grandmother's story. She went to a restaurant which kept some old things about her grandma. The Chef here was Cheng Musheng, Who looked exactly the same to the lover of Duan Tianying, Jingyun's grandma. They made a bet and Jingyun promised to tell Musheng about her grandma's love story. Time went back 1920s, the old Dongjiang was controlled by Hongs' mafia, the plutocrats of Lins and the police of Xus. Tianying was a normal girl who lived a normal life, but when she met the young master of Hongs whose name was Luo Fusheng and Xu Xingcheng, the young master of Xus, her life was completely changed. A legendary love story is about to begin.
imdb.title: Granting You a Dreamlike Life
plot: A love story between Luo Fusheng and Duan Tianying, which lasts for almost a hundred years.::Yang Ge

In the summer of 2016, Lin Jingyun, a French-Chinese epicure arrived in Dongjiang. She was here to know more about her grandmother's story. She went to a restaurant which kept some old things about her grandma. The Chef here was Cheng Musheng, Who looked exactly the same to the lover of Duan Tianying, Jingyun's grandma. They made a bet and Jingyun promised to tell Musheng about her grandma's love story. Time went back 1920s, the old Dongjiang was controlled by Hongs' mafia, the plutocrats of Lins and the police of Xus. Tianying was a normal girl who lived a normal life, but when she met the young master of Hongs whose name was Luo Fusheng and Xu Xingcheng, the young master of Xus, her life was completely changed. A legendary love story is about to begin.::Yang Ge
